dcterms:description: A large-scale semi-supervised dataset for offensive language identification containing a total of 9,275,847 noisy labeled tweets distributed across three subtasks.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2020 Task-12 (English Language) Offensive Language Identification

dcterms:description: A dataset from SemEval-2020 Task-12 focusing on categorizing offensive language as targeting a specific entity or not.
dcterms:title: Subtask-B Dataset (from SemEval-2020 Task-12)
